entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @IngrahamAngle After the #DemDebate2020, I am certain the #COVID19 is probably the only thing standing between you and re-election. A widespread in US will be the best weapon against you in November. DO NOT be complacent. There are now cases all over the world now. 🙏
